conservation-mode-enabled.tooltip: Limits battery charge to extend battery lifespan (e.g., to 60%).

rapid-charge-enabled.tooltip: Charges the battery faster when enabled.

accent-color.tooltip: Color for active toggles and highlights. Use RGB format (e.g., rgb(66, 133, 244)) or hex (#4285F4).

background-color.tooltip: Main desklet background color. Use RGBA format for transparency.

font-color.tooltip: Color for all text. Use RGB format (e.g., rgb(255, 255, 255)) or hex (#FFFFFF).

border-color.tooltip: Color for the desklet's border. Use RGB format (e.g., rgb(66, 133, 244)) or hex (#4285F4).

button-size.tooltip: Font size for toggle buttons (8-18 points).

desklet-width.tooltip: Minimum width of the desklet in pixels (150-400).

show-battery-percentage.tooltip: Display battery percentage and time remaining at the top.

update-interval.tooltip: How often to refresh battery status and sync settings (1-30 seconds).
